Medium: cotton
Technique: engraved and relief roller printed on plain weave; red, brown and black printed by engraved roller; yellow and blue printed by a relief roller
description: Polychrome panel with a vertical arrangement of flower bouquets (roses, passion flowers) with foliage. Set off against vertical background stripes of small S-curves within foliage. Staggered repeat.
